The Village (2013– ) 
 TV Series  -   60 min   -  Drama
Stars: Maxine Peake, John Simm & Nico Mirallegro
Storyline:-
Follows the residents of one English village across the 20th century and their turbulent lives.
i love you people that leave the imdb link^^

stop and reconsider before you dl this dreary lifeless bane on humanity, I waited until 10 minutes to the end of episode 6 before I threw up my hand in utter amazement at the dreariness of it all and deleted it ,never wanting to know how it ends..you are warned... what a bunch of mopey turds this hell was made of
